title: How do I change language?
body: Hi I just moved to US. I am trying to change language to Korean because it is really hard to understand item and skill's description. Is there any possible way to sovle this problem. I also tried changing "default_locale : ko_KR" in the league of legends file  but it didnt work plz help me

replies.body: Korean isn't currently one of the [**supported languages for the NA region**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594).
